text: maan nirmala kee neend baahar rasoeeghar mein jalee battee dekhakar khul gaee
use ekaek laga bhor ho gaee hai
uthakar kamare se baahar aa gaee
deevaar par tangee ghadee dekhee to paaya abhee raat ke do baj rahe hain
rasoeeghar mein jhaanka to dekha veena ko
pareshaanasee khadee gais par paanee garam kar rahee thee
itanee raat gae veena ko paanee garam karane kee kya soojhee vah rasoeeghar mein chalee aaee
veena ne maan ko dekha aur chaunkate hue bolee  are maan aap kaise uth gaeen
meree to bartan kee aavaaz se neend khul gaee
laga subah ho gaee
tum itanee raat ko yah paanee garam kyon kar rahee ho  poochha maan ne
uttar ke roop mein paaya veena kee hadabadaahat ko
dabe svar mein veena ne kaha  dev ko garm paanee kee botal de rahee hoon
unhen jaraasa dard ho raha hai
dard kaisa dard kya hua unhen  maan thoda ghabara gaee
kuchh nahin maan kamar mein dard ho raha hai
bas aap so jao
chinta na karo
abhee theek ho jaenge
veena ne baat ko itana kah gais band kar dee
maan ne aage badhakar usakee sahaayata kee rabad kee botal mein paanee daalane kee
veena chaah rahee thee maan unake kamare mein na jae
lekin rokatee kaise vah to usase pahale hee kamare mein ja pahunchee
dev ne unhen nahin dekha
vah aundhe munh palang par leta hua tha
haath usaka apanee kamar se neeche kulhe par tha
dard mein tadap raha tha vah
kuchh samajh na aaya unhen
vaheen khadee rahee kuchh pal
veena bheetar aaee to ishaare se usane maan ko baahar jaane ko kah diya
maan nirmala ko bhee usaka ishaara uchit laga
vah chupachaap baahar chalee aaee
neend usakee aankhon se door bhaag gaee thee
kaan usake dev ke kamare kee or lage the
pareshaanee badhatee ja rahee thee
dev ke karaahane kee aavaaz aa rahee thee
ye kya ho gaya hai dev jee ko na jaane kyon dard ho raha hai
maan nirmala ne apane pati ko dheere se hilaate hue kaha
pannaalaal kee aankh khul gaee
uthakar baithate hue vah bole  kya hua kyon neend nahin aa rahee
na jaane kya hua hai dev jee ko bahut dard ho raha hai
aavaaz sunee to neend khul gaee
itanee raat ko unake kamare mein bhee gaee lekin veena ne baahar jaane ko kah diya
nirmala ne man mein aaee shanka ko bataaya
tabeeyat kharaab ho gaee hogee
jyaada der baithane se dard ho jaata hai
ab sone kee koshish karo
subah poochh lena
yah kahakar pannaalaal to doosaree or munh karake phir so gae
lekin maan nirmala kee aankhon se neend door bhaag gaee thee
saath ke kamare mein unakee betee jaag rahee hai
pareshaan hai
vah kaise so sakatee hai isee udhedabun mein savera ho gaya
dekha unhonne veena phir paanee ka pateela garm karake kamare mein le jo rahee hai
is baar botal mein nahin poora pateela kamare mein jaata dekhakar vah phir bechain ho gaee
ho na ho dev kee tabeeyat bahut kharaab hai
himmat jutaee aur dheeme se uthakar veena ke kamare ke daravaaje par unhonne dastak dee
kshanabhar pashchaat hee veena ne daravaaja khola
maan ko dekhakar bolee  are aapako lagata hai neend nahin aaee
tum itanee der se jaag rahee ho
dev jee pareshaan hain
aise mein mujhe neend kaise aatee  maan ne apanee pareshaanee veena se kahee  ab dard kaisa hai
aaraam hai
kaha veena ne  abhee baatharoom gae hain
ek baat poochhoon veena baatharoom mein paanee ka geezar laga hai
phir bhee tum rasoee se paanee garam karake detee ho subahasavere
aisee kaisee aadat hai dev jee kee  maan ke chehare par kautoohal tha
yah jigyaasa shaant karana chaahatee thee vah
pahale aisa deharaadoon mein bhee unhonne dekha tha
vahaan to geezar nahin laga tha lekin yahaan to laga hai
phir bhee paanee rasoee se kyon abhee aur bhee poochhana chaah rahee thee phir bolee  baatharoom mein bhee ek ghanta lag jaata hai
bahut der tak kya karate hain
ab kya batae maan ko
chhoteesee baat aur us baat ka khulaasa karana nahin chaahatee vah
maan se jeevan mein pahalee baar usane kuchh chhipaaya tha
aaj tak aisa kuchh ghata bhee to nahin tha usake jeevan mein jo chhipaane kee jaroorat padatee use
maan ka prem maan ko saamane dekhakar chaahatee thee vah apana jee halka karana
lekin daba rahee thee apane man kee ichchha
usee bhaav se bolee  apaneeapanee aadat hotee hai maan dev ko saphaee kee chinta rahatee hai
geezar ka paanee tankee se aata hai aur rasoee mein paanee seedha nalake se
shuroo se vaham hai unhen
usee paanee se nahaate hain
uttar atapata tha
maan santusht nahin huee
bolee  ajeeb baat hai beta aisa to nahin dekha kabhee
ek pateele paanee se vah ek ghante tak kaise nahaate hai
maan santusht nahin thee
veena ko kuchh uttar bhee nahin soojh raha tha
baat badalate hue bolee  chalo maan chhodo yah sab
aao chhat par tahalate hain
ve donon chhat par aa gaeen
ghar ke saath hee peepal ka ped tha
bahut bada bahut puraana
lagabhag tees phut ooncha
sheetal vaataavaran mein usakee hava mein aur adhik sheetalata thee
veena jab bhee subahasavere thoda bojhil mahasoos karatee vaheen aakar baith jaatee thee
seedhee ke kinaare aur peepal ke vrksh kee tahaniyon ko dekhatee rahatee
maan saath thee lekin vah chup thee
maan ko laga aaj jaise veena ekaek badalee see lag rahee hai
jo khushee pahale dekhee thee usake chehare par vahaan gambheerata vidyamaan thee
veena ka chehara aaj use bujha dikhaee de raha tha
shaayad maan ka pyaar tha jo use sab badala dikh raha tha
geeta mein shree krshn ne kaha hai  janm se kuchh nahin hota
gun se gunon ka janm hota hai
janm se karm ka roop banata hai paristhitiyaan naene karm rachatee hain aur svabhaav ke mishran se gyaan ke bhaav se maanav karm apanaata hai
aise mein janm se nahin nirdhaarit hota varn
varn svabhaav ke anuroop hota hai varn paristhiti ke anuroop hota hai
varn har praanee mein har bhaav mein har dam badal sakata hai
gyaan se sanskaar se paristhiti se nit nae naveen karm se praanee ka niyat karm nirdhaarit hota hai
samaaj kee sanrachana mein bhee sabhee varn pradhaan gyaanee jan ka gyaan kshatriy ka bal vaishy ka vyaapaar karm aur shoodr ka sevaadharm mahaan hai
in chaar bhaavon kee sanrachana se banata hai samaaj
yahee chaaron bhaav har parivaar mein bhee vidyamaan hote hain
ghar ka har sadasy kisee na kisee bhaav kisee na kisee karm ka prateek hota hai
sabhee apanaapana yogadaan dete hain har ghar mein
lekin ek praanee aisa bhee hota hai jo in chaaron bhaavon ko apane mein samete hota hai
vah roop hai maan ka
har maan ka roop chaturbhujee hota hai
maan ke roop mein har naaree apane bachche ke lie braahman ban gyaan sanchaarit karatee hai
maan ke roop mein har naaree kshatriy ban apane bachche kee raksha karatee hai
maan ke roop mein har naaree vaishy ban parivaar ka suchaaroo roop se sanchaalan karatee hai
maan hee ke roop mein naaree shoodr bhaav se apane bachchon kee seva karatee hai
parivaar tabhee poornata paata hai jab maan apane parivaar ke utthaan ke lie chaaron bhaavon se yukt ho usakee mangalakaamana karatee hai
aisee maan har kisee ko apane ghar mein mil jaegee
yah maan gyaan ka punj hai aur vahee gyaan ka punj vidyamaan tha maan nirmala mein
ekaant mein veena ko nihaaratee huee maan padh rahee thee veena ke hrday mein basee tarangon ko
use usake bheetar ek gaharee chuppee chhaee dikh rahee thee

unheen bhaavon mein vicharatee bolee  betee na jaane kyon mujhe lag raha hai ki tum jo baahar se bahut khush dikhatee ho mujhe bheetaraheebheetar kaheen kuchh sochatee ho har dam bheetaraheebheetar kaee saare bhaav vicharate hain tumhaare man mein
aisa lagata hai tum mujhase kuchh chhipaana chaah rahee ho
maan kee usake hrday mein base bhaavon ko padh paane kee kshamata ko dekhakar veena ne apanee drshti utha kar maan ko dekha
palabhar mein hee usane apanee drshti hata lee usake chehare se
maan se kuchh bhee chhipa paana mushkil laga use
use laga yah vahee maan hai jisase vah bachapan se lekar shaadee tak apane man kee har baat kah detee thee
yah vahee maan hai jisase use man mein basee kisee bhee shanka ka samaadhaan mil jaata tha
yah vahee maan hai jo usakee har chaah ko bade prem se thaah detee rahee hai
veena usase kuchh chhipa na paee
ekaek aansuon kee aviral dhaara bah nikalee
vah godee mein sir rakhakar phaphakane lagee
maan nirmala ke kaanon ko vishvaas nahin ho raha tha

ye kya kahe ja rahee hai veena dev jo kitana sundar kitana saumy yah kaisa bhaav hai usaka kaisa jeevan jee raha hai adhooraapan dev ka jo kitana bhayagrast kie hai usakee betee ko man halka hua to sochane lagee apanee betee ke baare mein
kitana vishaal hai veena ka hrday sab jaanakar bhee kaise apana liya hai usane dev ko
sab jaan kar bhee vah usake parivaar se gila nahin rakhatee
kitanee khush rahatee hai vah  maan ek hee baat man mein aaee
shaayad yah mere bhaagy mein likha tha
mainne dev ke gunon ko apana liya
mainne usake gunon mein jeena seekh liya
main usake dosh ko dekh nahin paee
yah sanskaar mujhe daidee se mile
bachapan se hee sunatee thee shree krshn kee vaanee ko
bachapan se sunatee thee geeta bhaav ko ki gunavaanon ke gunon ko dekho
gun mein dosh kabhee na dhoondho
mere bhaagy mein dev ka aana likha tha
mainne apana sab kuchh use samarpit kar diya hai
ab mere jeevan ka dhyey hai dev kee mangalakaamana
sab theek chal raha hai maan
kuchh pal chup rahee veena phir bolee  mainne socha tha aur svayan se vaayada kiya tha ki kisee ko yah baat na kahoongee
lekin main rah nahin paayee
aapase kuchh chhipa nahin paee
pichhale haphte amit se bhee kah baithee apane dil ka haal
mammee bas aapase meree vinatee hai ki is vishay mein aap kabhee bhee dev ya usake parivaar vaalon se koee jikr na karana
main khush hoon aur yahee sochatee hoon ki aise hee meree khushee banee rahegee
abhee tak sab theek chal raha hai aur aage bhee theek rahega
veena ke bhaav vinatee bhare the
man to bujh gaya hai mera betee kaise apane man mein yah bojha chhipae rah sakatee hoon  tab maan ne kaha
lekin yah bojh mere vivaahit jeevan kee mangalakaamana se bada to nahin
jo ho chuka usaka ab kya rona maan jo ho raha hai main usee se khush hoon
yahee sochakar mera man shaant ho gaya hai ki ye sab yadi shaadee ke baad hota tab ham kya karate
veena ne maan ko tasallee denee chaahee
tab yahee sochate ki bhaagy mein likha tha
maan veena ke bhaavon ko hee vyakt kar baithee
to yahee baat hai yah mere bhaagy mein hee likha tha
mujhe to jo kuchh bhee pata chala hai shaadee ke baad hee pata chala hai
aur main isamen kisee par dosh madh kar bhee shaanti nahin paoongee
haan kuchh karatee to shaadee kee pahalee raat ko hee karatee
tab bhee bahut socha tha lekin phir yahee apane bhaagy kee den maan kar saharsh apana liya
ab main dev ko apana doosara roop maanane lagee hoon
main ab usake kashton ko kam karana chaahatee hoon
usakee bhaavanaon kee thaah lie rahana chaahatee hoon
ab usake kasht badhaana mere bas kee baat nahin
veena ke man se bahut bada bojh hat gaya tha
ekaek use apane man se dar bhaag gaya lagata tha
maan se kahakar vah bahut halka mahasoos kar rahee thee svayan ko aur dev jaise apane aur kareeb aaya lag raha tha
jaise aaj use laga tha ki dev ke har bhaav ko vah hee nahin sab jaanate hain
maan nirmala chup rahee veena kee baat sunakar
gumasumasee baithee rahee
veena kuchh der maan ko dekhatee rahee phir bolee  maan ab tum kuchh mat socho
chinta mat karo
tumhaaree betee khush hai aur isee mein tumhaaree khushee hai
dev ko apana samajhatee rahee ho ab tak use apana hee beta maan lo
apana maan logee to tumhen svayan lagega ki jo kuchh bhee hua hai kisee achchhe ke lie hua hai
aise mein kisee ke saath tumhen gila nahin rahega
maan nirmala ka hrday vishaal tha lekin itana bhee vishaal nahin tha shaayad ki veena ke bhaavon ko jhat se apana letee
ye kya hua usake saath itana bada dhokha dhokhe mein jaldeejaldee baat ko ghumaaphira kar akhabaar ke vigyaapan mein vyakt karake svayan ko saantvana de dee
ghar bhar kee chinta karane vaalee
apanee is betee par to maan ko sada se garv raha hai
aise mein yah sab kaise ho gaya
betee ko dekha maan ne
vah usakee god mein sir rakhe aankhen moonde thee
vah to santusht hai
usakee soch sabase niraalee hai
usane dev ko apane jeevanasaathee ke roop mein saharsh sveekaar kar liya hai
ye bhaav kaise hain apanee sabhee ichchhaon apanee sabhee aakaankshaon ko samarpit kar diya usane kitanee sahajata se dev kee paristhitiyon par usake man kee maap sambhav nahin
yah kaisa bandhan hai yah bandhan maan nirmala ko to janzeer lag raha tha
jaise unakee betee in janzeeron mein bandh gaee hai
chaah kar bhee unase chhootana nahin chaahatee

yah samarpan bhaav hai ya phir haalaat ke sahaare svayan ko chhod dene ka kaayar bhaav svayan se prashn karatee nirmala apanee betee se bolee  tum svayan ko is bhanvar mein phansa to nahin pa rahee ham tumhaare saath hain betee tum hamaare saath deharaadoon chalo
baith kar kuchh nirnay karenge
aisa kaise ho sakata hai itanee badee baat par parda aur us par tumhaara chupachaap sab sveekaar kar lena mujhe to lag raha hai jaise abhee bhee tum aur kisee baat par parda daal rahee ho
veena uth kar baith gaee maan kee baat sunakar
bolee  yah kaisee baat kar rahee ho maan main na kahatee to kaise pata lagata aapako jo hai vah kah diya
mera man halka ho gaya
aur maan isase aage na mainne kabhee socha hai aur na soch sakatee hoon
aapako aisa kyon laga ki main jaise yahaan kisee dabaab mein jee rahee hoon mujhe to sab theek lag raha hai
mainne to aapako ek beetee kahaanee suna dee
vah kahaanee meree dekhee huee nahin hai lekin vah kahaanee mujhe apanee lagatee hai
dev koee abhee aakar mil gaya nahin lagata
dev ka saath mujhe pichhale janmon ka sambandh lagata hai
dev ka saath paakar main duhkh nahin pa rahee
koee kasht nahin bhog rahee
vah mujhe apana jeevan lag raha hai aur usake har roop mein svayan ko upasthit paakar lag raha hai yah saath mere jeevan ka uddeshy hai
apanee ichchhaen mujhe dev kee saathee banakar pooree hotee lag rahee hain
vah bhaavanaon mein bah kar bolee  tumhen meree kasam maan is baat ko bisara do
bhool jao ki mainne aapako kuchh kaha hai
aur maan kya kahatee dekhatee rah gaee veena ko
doosare ke bhaavon mein jee rahee veena ka yah roop use mohit kie ja raha tha
unhen laga jaise yah veena to bahut oopar hai sabase
yah virakti bhaav apanee bhaavaanaon se oopar uthakar jeene kee tamanna ek saadhaaranamaanav mein nahin ho sakatee
vah jaise yah jeevan apane dev ke lie hee jeena chaahatee hai
apanee har ichchha apanee har chaahana jaise dev kee har bhaavana ke anuroop banaana chaahatee hai
yah prem bhaav jaise janmajanmaantar ke rishton ka prateek hai
aise mein use laga ki veena ko jis baat mein khushee mil rahee hai usee bhaav mein use prasann rahana chaahie
tab prem se nirmala ne veena ke sir par haath pherate hue kaha  tum to mujhase adhik sahanasheel ho mujhase kaee guna samajhadaar
mujhe garv hai tum par jo peechhe nahin dekh rahee bas aage achchha dekhane kee tamanna hai
tum chinta na karo dev ke har bhaav mein tum mujhe apane saath paogee
phir kuchh ruk kar bolee  main apane tareeke se tumhaare daidee jee se baat kar loongee
tum ab kisee se kuchh na kahana
veena maan ke shabd sunakar usake chehare ko apane haathon mein lekar pyaar karane lagee
use apanee maan duniyaan kee sabase achchhee maan lagane lagee thee
jee halka hua donon ka tab ve neeche aa gaeen
dev tab tak naha kar draeengaroom mein baitha tha
paas mein pannaalaal bhee baithe the aur donon ke beech akhabaar kee kisee khabar ko lekar baat ho rahee thee
aansuon kee aviral dhaara bah nikalee pannaalaal kee aankhon se
unhen jaise vishvaas hee na ho raha tha nirmala ke shabdon mein
yah kya kah rahee hai nirmala kaise hua ye sab svayan ko doshee khada pa rahe the vah
kyon vah doshee nahin betee kee shaadee ho jae jaldee se
haath peele karake vida kar den jaldee se
bojh thee kya vah jo bina jaanchapadataal kie haan kah dee bin sochesamajhe kaise sab jaldee se ho gaya
akhabaar ka vigyaapan bhee nahin padha tha unhonne
padhate to shaayad dikshanaree hee khol lete
kyon likha tha vaisa yah jigyaasa to shaant kar lete
betee ne jo kaha usee ko maan gae
aur shesh sab eeshvar par chhod diya
dev ko dekha tha har roop usaka unhen apanee betee ke anuroop laga
aise mein jab sabakuchh ho gaya vah achchhe ke lie hee soch kar hua
aise mein abhee tak sab theek hai phir kaahe ka rona
jo nahin hua usakee kalpana mein tasveer kheenchana aur usake lie shor machaana yah sab uchit nahin
aise hee bhaavon ko lie unhonne svayan ko saantvana dee aur nirmala se bole  ab jo ho chuka us paru nahin socho
ab jo jaisa hai theek hai
jaisa meree betee ke bhaagy mein likha tha jaisa usake bhaagy mein likha hoga vahee hoga
abhee tak vah khush hai
achchha parivaar hai
achchhe log hain
betee jo chaah rahee hai vaisa hee hamen karana chaahie
itanee baat kahakar unhonne nirmala ko dhaadhas bandhaaya
pannaalaal ke samabhaav ko dekhakar nirmala ko laga jaise veena apane pita kee soch ke anuroop hee hai
pannaalaal ke gyaan kee baaten usake sanskaar jaise veena ke roop mein ujaagar the
kitanee sahajata se unhonne apanee putree ke bhaavon ko apana liya tha
kabheekabhee ham apanee soch apane tak hee rakhana chaahate hain doosare kee soch mein hamen shaayad apane bhaav bharane achchhe nahin lagate
pannaalaal kee bhee yahee prakrti thee
nirmala bhee apane man ko tasallee de rahee thee
donon ne ekadoosare ko to samajha diya lekin donon ka man apane aap mein bojhil ho gaya tha
